dmca.title: DMCA complaint against www.wydahtours.com.com
dmca.body:
Greenlife
Southern Africa
Nature and Culture Based Travel Specialists Since 1992

[] Cape Town, South Africa.
Tel: []	Fax: []
E-mail: []Agreenlife.co.za

15 February 2005
Google, Inc. 
[]
Attn: []

Dear Google

DCMA complaint against www.wydahtours.com.com

I wish to lodge a complaint against the above website for copying verbatim from my site, www.game-reserve com, a total of 4316 words on 6 different pages, which are identical to the copy on 7 pages on www.game-reserve.com.
As a result of this, [] has gained very valuable placing in google SERPS, and is clearly using the content to drive customers to its site and thereby generate revenue, to the detriment of our company, which developed www.game-reserve.com and its entire contents, including all written copy. The site is copyrighted on every page.

Details of the infringements as follows:
1. Affected URL's on www.game-reserve.com are:

(i) 	www.game-reserve.com/botswana_okavango-morem.html
(ii) 	www.game-reserve.com/botswana_chobe.html

(iii)	www.game-reserve.com/botswana_linyanti.html

(iv)	www.game-reserve.com/botswana_makgadikgadi.html

(v) 	www.game-reserve.com/botswana_mashatu.html

(vi) 	www.game-reserve.com/botswana_nxai-pan.html

(vii)www.game-reserve.com/botswana_nxai-pan.html

2. The copyrighted work at issue is the text reproduced verbatim on the following URL's on www.wydahtours.com
(i)
